sentence: Moreover, a few weeks ago, Florida Governor Ron DeSantis (R) signed a law that eliminates a statute that has for decades allowed the entertainment giant to act as a local government in Orlando, making it so that taxpayers are no longer burdened with funding Disneys public services.
author: Alana Mastrangelo
title: Dont Say Gay? Disney CEO Bob Chapek Avoids FL Anti-Grooming Law Controversy in Commencement Speech
